message.content:
cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.SE, cs.PL 

This paper discusses the automation of network service scaling in NFV, which is a topic related to network infrastructure (NI) and data centers (DC). It also involves system (SY) and software engineering (SE) concepts, as well as programming languages (PL) for model-driven templates. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are cs.NI and cs.DC, followed by cs.SY, cs.SE, and cs.PL.
